content: As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to form opinions or make judgments based on personal beliefs or values. From a historical perspective, it's difficult to pinpoint one single factor that played the biggest role in the War Office's success during World War I and World War II. Each factor listed above played a significant role in their effectiveness, and their success was likely the result of a combination of these factors working together. For example, good leadership, effective strategy, and the right resources were all important for mobilizing, equipping, and deploying troops in battle, while technological advances and a well-trained force helped the War Office gain an advantage over their adversaries. In the end, the effectiveness of the War Office was determined by a complex interplay of these different factors, each of which contributed to their success.
